name: Dclpxsltbox
tagline: Sandbox for experimenting with DCLP/PN XSLT stuff
body:
# Test data: 

* [DCLP fork of papyri/idp.data git repository; dclp branch and subdirectory](https://github.com/DCLP/idp.data/tree/dclp)

# Current code: 

* PN-specific stylesheets: [DCLP fork of papyri/navigator git repository, xslt-master branch, pn-xslt subdirectory](https://github.com/DCLP/navigator/tree/xslt-master/pn-xslt)
* EpiDoc standard stylesheets: [EpiDoc example-p5-xslt svn repository, DCLP branch](http://sourceforge.net/p/epidoc/code/HEAD/tree/branches/dclp/example-p5-xslt/)

# Latest transform results:

* From the modified PN and EpiDoc XSLT code: [output/dclp/](output/dclp)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
